name: XCOM: Enemy Unknown

files.setup: N/A:Select setup exe downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select setup exe downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/XCOM Enemy Unknown/XEW/Binaries/Win32/XComLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: directx9 vcrun2010 vcrun2017 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: tkg-3.21-x86_64
